籺字的基本解释

籺
hé
米麦的碎屑，多用指粗食：“乱世诛求急，黎民糠籺窄。”
泛指稻、麦等的籽粒。

籺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hé］
［《廣韻》胡結切，入屑，匣。］
［《集韻》下扢切，入，匣。］
亦作“1”。同“麧1”。
米麦的粗屑。亦泛指粗糙的食物。

籺字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　籺； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页906第41
【廣韻】胡結切【集韻】奚結切，?音纈。屑米細者曰籺。　又【類篇】恨竭切。米粉。　又【類篇】下扢切。堅麥也。一曰俗謂粗屑爲籺。

籺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
籺字的起名意思

暂无。

Guilty
Basic explanation of words
Guilty
hé
Crumbs of rice and wheat are often used to refer to coarse food: "In troubled times, if you want to be urgent, the chaff of the people is narrow."
Refers to the grains of rice and wheat in general.
Guilty
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hé］
["Guang Yun" Hu knot cutting, cutting into chips, box. ]
["Ji Yun" cut from the bottom, enter , box. ]
Also called "1". Same as "麧1".
Crumbs of rice and wheat. Also refers to rough foods.
Guilty
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Uncollected First] [Mi Zi Department] 　籺; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 906 No. 41
[Guangyun] Hu Jieqie [Jiyun] Xijieqie, with a sound of Valerian. Those with fine crumbs say 籺.　[Category] Hate and die. rice flour.　[Classes] Next cut. Kenmai also. One said that crude crumbs are vulgarized jackals.
Guilty
